modName: Life is Strange - Chloe Price - Clothing and Hair UNP - DELETED
summary: This mod adds the basic clothing that the character Chloe Price wears  in Life is Strange Episode 1 to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[u][size=6][b][Life is Strange] Chloe Price - Clothing & Hair[/b]
[/size][/u][size=5][b]Description:[/b]
[/size][size=3]First of all, I am a total newb when it comes to modeling or rigging, so expect some clipping or rigging issues.
I made this mod just for the sake of having some Life is Strange content in Skyrim.
If there are things you could help out with for eg. explaining me how to fix the issues you may find (in case you have the knowledge) I'd be glad if you could help me out and explain certain stuff to me.
The entire clothing is rigged on an UNP BodyÂ  - (I hope that I've done that correctly...)[/size]

[size=5][b]This mod contains:[/b][/size]
[list]
[*][size=3]2 Hairstyles: Hair w/ Beanie, Hair without Beanie[/size]
[*][size=3]Chloe's vanilla clothing: Jacket, Shoes, Shirt, Bracelet[/size]
[/list]
[size=5][b]Credits:[/b][/size]
[list=1]
[*][size=4]Lilothestitch - for uploading the original LiS Model to models-resource[/size]
[*][size=4]Canderes509 - for uploading a YouTube video explaining how to properly create hair[/size]
[*][size=4]Nightasy - for his YouTube tutorials on creating armor for Skyrim[/size]
[*][size=4]dimon99 - UNP Body[/size]

[*][size=4]DONTNOD Entertainment - Thank you for creating such a beautiful game and characters[/size]
[/list]
author: hoeward
